# DARWHIN GOMEZ  
Darwhin88@gmail.com | 929-305-7353 | [LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/in/darwhin)  
New York City  

## SUMMARY  
Solutions-focused technologist with experience in data analysis and visualization, driving impactful business decisions.  

## CORE SKILLS  
- Python (pandas, scikit-learn, seaborn)  
- SQL / NoSQL  
- Data Visualization (QuickSight, Power BI)  
- Statistical Analysis & Machine Learning  
- ETL/ELT & Data Modeling  

## EXPERIENCE  
### Solutions Architect Intern  
**Amazon Web Services (AWS)**, Arlington, VA (Remote/Hybrid)  
*Jun 2025 – Sep 2025*  
- Automated sentiment-analysis pipeline processing 1M+ records, achieving 5x faster feedback loops.  
- Fine-tuned models in SageMaker, improving accuracy by ~5% and reducing toxicity by ~8%.  

### IT Instructor Assistant  
**RF CUNY & Generation USA**, Remote, NY  
*Feb 2022 – Aug 2023*  
- Delivered 36 lessons to 200+ learners, maintaining a 96% cohort graduation rate.  
- Developed testing materials and tracked student engagement using a custom database.  

### Volunteer IT Support and Development Intern  
**Mayor’s Office of Information Services**, New York, NY  
*Feb 2024 – Current*  
- Restored over 400 devices through hardware/software updates, enhancing operational efficiency.  
- Automated troubleshooting workflows via Python scripts, reducing manual workload significantly.  

## EDUCATION  
**Master of Science – Data Science and Machine Learning**  
City University of New York – School of Professional Studies  
*Expected Jan 2026*  
- GPA 4.0, Dean’s List 2x  

**Bachelor of Technology – Computer Information Systems**  
City University of New York – NYC College of Technology  
*Jun 2024*  
- GPA 3.78, Dean’s List (5x), National Honor Society  

## CERTIFICATIONS  
- AWS Certified Solutions Architect – Associate  
- AWS Certified AI Practitioner – Generative AI  
- Google Cybersecurity Certificate  
- Google Information Support Certificate  

## INTERESTS  
- AI Ethics, Data Analysis, Financial Services, Technology Trends
